plot: Crooks use an airship to rob a train and are caught by a detective whom a boy saves from a snakepit.
title: The Great Python Robbery
plot_es: Crooks use an airship to rob a train and are caught by a detective whom a boy saves from a snakepit.
plot_en: Crooks use an airship to rob a train and are caught by a detective whom a boy saves from a snakepit.
